name: docutray-plugins
description: Docutray's collection of Claude Code plugins for agile development workflows

plugins.name: devflow
plugins.description: Complete agile development workflow commands for Claude Code based on GitHub and best practices. Includes feature planning, implementation, validation, and PR review commands.

plugins.name: rag-research
plugins.description: RAG-based reference document management for research. Index documents (PDF, Markdown, Text) and search them semantically using Qdrant + FastEmbed for efficient local vector storage and retrieval.
